Change Log¶

0.2dev (2011-01-05)¶

Support changed authentication method (thanks Peter Sanchez) and new alert volume property.

0.1.5 (2009-12-10)¶

Google added a new “Email length” property to alerts controlling the number of results delivered. This release fixes screen scraping which was broken by the changes to the web interface. Galerts support for the new “Email length” property deferred to a future release.

0.1.4 (2009-12-01)¶

Initial release. Supports viewing, creating, deleting, and modifying Google alerts (everything you can currently do through the web interface). Modifiable alert properties: search terms, type, frequency, delivery method.
